description: Explore the intricacies of open source license management with a case study on Theta Drop, an NFT marketplace utilizing Theta blockchain. Learn about challenges and strategies in balancing open source and proprietary software to enhance development and compliance.
keywords: open source licenses, Theta Drop, NFT marketplace, blockchain, OSS management, GNU General Public License, MIT License, Apache License, Theta blockchain, software compliance, licensing policy, software composition analysis, legal consultation
title: Navigating Open Source Licenses: The Case of Theta Drop
